amendment.description: An amendment numbered 3 printed in House Report 118-308 to prevent the United States Department of Agriculture from issuing any rule that bans varieties of milk covered in this bill, including chocolate milk.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Tiffany amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Tiffany amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Tiffany amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.
